item.title: Model Context Protocol: An Overview
item.description:
Over the summer, I’ve been spending a lot of time working with the latest open framework for agentic AI: Model Context Protocol. In this article, we’ll go through what exactly MCP is and how it can significantly enhance agentic workflows.

What is MCP?

Model Context Protocol is the “USB-C” or the “glue” of agentic AI—a protocol developed by Anthropic to standardize how tools, resources, prompts, and more (i.e. context) are exposed to AI agents. Its name effectively describes its job:
